name: Funshow
title: funshowtech.com
shortDescription: Funshow allows users to generate dynamic QR codes that can be edited and tracked. Ideal for businesses and marketers, it supports various QR code types such as URL, WhatsApp, Twitter, and Text. Users can customize their QR codes with logos, colors, and shapes, and download them in multiple formats. An example use case is a restaurant updating its menu URL in the QR code without needing to reprint the physical codes.
cons: May not support all QR code types

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Beaconstac
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides QR codes with marketing focus
